channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Official says Wisconsin shooter was new student at Christian school where her victims had deep ties
item.description: An official at the Wisconsin school where a student shot and killed a teacher and a fellow student says the 15-year-old was in her first semester there.
